name: The Optical Sound Of (CD)
description:
The debut album by The Hypnotic Eye includes the singles "Marianne" featuring "The Horrors", and "Satisfaction" as used on a Worldwide television campaign featuring Georgia Jagger.

The Man From The CIA
Frying Pan Death Witch Blues
Marianne
The Dark Part Of My Mind
Hey Joe
Readin' Your Will

Fly On The Wall
Satisfaction 
Action Woman
Thought Machine
Searching
San Antonio Hunting Song

Mixed by Ben Baptie at Electric Lady Studios

Mastering By Miles Showell at Abbey Road Studios

Artwork by Martin Butler & Lindsay Murray

Contact us at lovebuzz@hypnoticeye.co.uk or visit hypnoticeye.co.uk

name: LIMITED NUMBER LEFT! Record Store Day Split with John's Children
description:
STRICTLY LIMITED!

JOHN'S CHILDREN / THE HYPNOTIC EYE
CORNFLAKE ZOO / SMASHED! BLOCKED!
 
Rough Trade says:
"In 2013 Andy Ellison and the reformed John's Children regrouped to record a Marc Bolan song in their new guise. 'Cornflake Zoo' Originally appeared as a B-Side to an Andy Ellison solo single from 1968 and here heralds the resurgence of one of the legends of mod / proto-punk / 60s warriors. On the flip, The Hypnotic Eye bring a stomping rock n roll perspective on a John's Children original in the shape of 'Smashed! Blocked!'."

name: Satisfaction Limited Edition 7"
description:
POST PAID PRICE - Available now.

£5 Collect From Show.

The second single by The Hypnotic Eye, 

A: Satisfaction
AA: Readin' Your Will (Originally recorded by The Human Expression)

Mixed by Ben Baptie, this double A side vinyl affair comes in Special Edition Artwork designed by 
Lynne Holyoke for The Human Expression in 1967.

Half-Speed Mastering By Miles Showell

Limited hand numbered edition of 250.

Contact us at lovebuzz@hypnoticeye.co.uk or visit hypnoticeye.co.uk
